entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
